Title: India cement closed all its factories due to Coronavirus - News Track English
Description: CHENNAI: The outbreak of Corona virus epidemic that has taken over the world has now hit cement factories as well. Major cement manufacturer India Cement has also announced the closure of its cement factories across the country in view of the threat of Coronaâ€¦

Title: Coronavirus: Kiara Advani burns all the quarantine calories with treadmill workout - India Today
Description: Kiara Advani recently shared a video in which she can be seen walking on a treadmill in her home.

Title: Panic, Anxiety, Depression: What Coronavirus Lockdown Means for India's Mental Health - News18
Description: While the COVID-19 outbreak has led to philosophical questions about survival, humanity and the future, the changes and the chaos that it is bringing in the lives of Indians are hard to cope with.

Title: Coronavirus thrives on silent carriers. Beware of loss of smell - India Today
Description: Reports from China suggest that one-third of novel coronavirus patients showed no regular symptoms like cough, fever or loss of breath. Now, ENT specialists in Britain point to loss of the sense of smell as a new test for Covid-19.

Title: HIV drug combo approved by ICMR for coronavirus treatment fails clinical trials in China - ThePrint
Description: Anti-HIV drugs Lopinavir and Ritonavir were administered to treat two Italian tourists in India who had tested positive for the coronavirus infection.

Title: ICMR advises use of hydroxy-chloroquine to shield health workers against corona infection - India Today
Description: Amid rising coronavirus cases in the country, the national task force for Covid-19 constituted by Indian Council for Medical Research (ICMR) has recommended hydroxy-chloroquine as a preventive medication for high-risk population.

Title: Coronavirus Outbreak in India: Hydroxychloroquine Drug Recommended as Treatment For COVID-19 by ICMR - LatestLY
Description: The Indian Council of Medical Research (ICMR) has recommended hydroxychloroquine drug for the treatment of coronavirus-affected patients in an advanced stage of the disease.

Title: How close are we to finding a cure for Corona? - Times of India
Description: India News: In the race to find a cure for coronavirus, scientists from  all across the world are coming together and trying to find a specific drug or treatment
